metadata.title: CVE-2020-15306 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in OpenEXR before v2.5.2. Invalid chunkCountattributes could cause a heap buffer overflow in getChunkOffsetTableSize()in IlmImf/ImfMisc.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15306` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.3
openexr - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-10ubuntu2.3').
